name: InputGroup
purpose: Compose inputs with inline addons, buttons, icons, or helper controls.
useWhen: Input needs inline icons or text
Input is paired with a button or dropdown
Additional context is embedded within the input
rules: InputGroup enhances a single input or textarea
InputGroup does not provide semantic meaning
Focus should remain on the input control
doNotUseWhen: Used as a replacement for Field
aiHints: Use InputGroup for composition, not validation
Combine InputGroup with Field for full form inputs
